tool_description: Archive data of some blue chip's tickers
name: stocks_archive
title: stocks_archive

api_list.name: ping
api_list.description: Check that server is still alive
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stocks_archive.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stocks_archive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: tickerData
api_list.description: Returns a list of ticker records
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stocks_archive.p.rapidapi.com/ticker/archive/gold/1h/2010-04-12T14:30/2010-04-20T12:30"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stocks_archive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stocks_archive.p.rapidapi.com/ticker/archive/{tickername}/{period}/{startdate}/{enddate}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stocks_archive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: tickersList
api_list.description: Returns a list of available tickers
